RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 48. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOSH'N prompted the early pace two wide, took command on the turn, drew off in upper stretch and won under brisk handling. AFLEET O ME unhurried early, rallied along the rail through the stretch and finished second best. GOOD MUSIC with the second flight inside, angled out on the turn, offered a mild bid three wide into the stretch and was outfinished for second. KETTLE KING trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals in the three path. CANTRUNWITHBIGDOGS with the second flight three wide, failed to respond. OXBOW'S RIDE failed to menace. LITTLE RONS ROCKET well placed, weakened on the turn. FAST AS FAST CAN B away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the turn, had speed into the stretch and gave way late.

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet O Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, late rally, inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Fast as Fast Can B
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, turn, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Josh'n
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, took over turn, drew off, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 18 Allowed 4 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOWNTOWN CONNECTOR trailed for nearly a half, circled his field rapidly on the far turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch and drew clear under mild urging. R CARDINAL PRINCE pressed the pace three wide, was bumped entering the far turn and finished second best. LEMON DROP SHOT pressed the pace two wide then along the inside into the stretch and finished with good courage. GOODBYELLOWBRICKRD away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then weakened. CYCLONE settled five wide, was bumped entering the far turn then failed to menace. CENTSOFWANDER allowed to settle, moved up between horses near the far turn, bumped with rivals, drew on even terms for the lead on the second turn, had speed into the stretch then came up empty. GRAND DEAL had good early speed along the inside and was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Goodbyellowbrickrd
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: R Cardinal Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, bumped 3/8 pole, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Downtown Connector
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field 2nd turn, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Ju ly 18 Allowed 4 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAVEN MOON settled outside, closed willingly in the five path through the stretch and was along in time under left handed urging. MUGSY MALONE was sent to the front soon after the start, set all the pace along the inside then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. MASTER OF WAR saved ground and finished with good courage. DISTORTED LIMITS went evenly. DECEITFUL failed to menace. SAMMY'S SMILE was no threat. GOING IN STYLE was hung five wide into the first turn, went up to press the pace two wide before a quarter, kept on into the stretch then faltered. ST. LUKES close up early, was through after a half, suffered and injury in upper stretch, pulled up and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Malone
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace inside, caught

ENTRY.NAME: St. Lukes
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, through after half, pulled up injured, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Raven Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside, closed willingly, 5path, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Going in Style
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide first turn, pressed pace, 2 wide, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: Deceitful
ENTRY.OWNER: Pelfrey Ruth Nicoletta Gerard and Tait Bob

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWERK unhurried early, closed rapidly along the rail through upper stretch, made the lead late and drew off under right handed urging. CLIFTONS BALLERINA sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace until deep stretch in the three path then was no match for the winner. LADY FORTUNE stalked pace outside, dug in late and missed second. APPEALING SENORITA chased the pace along the inside, shifted out before the turn, had speed into the stretch then faded. SOLE FACTOR trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, angled out 7/16pole, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Cliftons Ballerina
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace late stretch, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Twerk
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed fast rail, drew off, right handed urging

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace outside, dug in, missed second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 92. Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 18, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MON CAMO away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch while drifting out to the middle of the racetrack to win as much the best. VENETIAN DREAM pressured the winner three wide and gamely held on for second. MY TWO AUNT JOANS never far back, finished with good courage outside rivals. LAZARUS PROJECT raced five wide down the backstretch and went evenly. MONTAUK COVE was fractious in the gate, stumbled at the start, rushed to contention along the rail before a quarter, lacked room into the turn then faded in the stretch. RIVERBOAT GAMBLER was no factor. STAY THIRSTY AMIGO had speed through the turn then weakened. EXALTED JOY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, stumbled start, rushed, no room rail, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Camo
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace,drew off, much the best, drifted mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Venetian Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, gamely second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Aunt Joans
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 91. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Rac e Since July 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BREEZY MONEY drifted out bumping BOURBON WISDOM at the start, set all the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best while being ridden out. BOURBON WISDOM was bumped at the start, settled outside rivals, had a mild late rally and finished well clear for second in the three path. AUGER chased the winner into the stretch then weakened. WAR NOVEL well placed, failed to respond. SEE SPOT RUN got out on the first turn and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Breezy Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out, bumped start, led throughout, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Wisdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, outside trip, late rally, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MARCH 18. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WEEKEND BUZZ was bounced around between rivals then squeezed at the start, allowed to settle, rallied along the inside into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and drew off under right handed urging. OHIO PLAYER drifted out at the start, sprinted to the lead, widened on the turn, drifted to the five path entering the stretch then was no match for the winner. PLATE IT UP raced outside and went evenly. FOREIGN was bumped at the start, chased the pace into the stretch then gave way. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA was in tight, bumped at the start then trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, set pace mid stretch, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend Buzz
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed start, saved ground, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Foreign
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased, gave way, lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 18 Allowed 4 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEVERLY PARK allowed to settle, closed with a burst of speed two wide through the stretch in the four path under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. UOTTALIKEIT broke in full stride to set all the pace with a clear lead then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. IT'S OFFICIAL hopped at the start and went evenly. DUKE OF DARKNESS had brief speed. BISCUITS AND GRITS trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Beverly Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed fast, 2 wide, up in final strides,
